item.daedalus.love_poem_sword.desc0.line: When the stars fade into oblivion
When fate writes its final chapter
My only regret is the tear-filled ending
item.daedalus.love_poem_sword.desc1.line: You will love me no longer
So I remain here, all alone
What did you say back then?
Words that cannot be conveyed drift in the air
Though I know it in my heart
Today I still make every wish that cannot come true
enchantment.daedalus.daedalus_bow.desc: Increases charging speed for bows, crossbows, and tridents.
enchantment.daedalus.abyssal_gaze.desc: Your eyes become the Eyes of Cthulhu. Creatures you stare at are dragged into the abyss.
enchantment.daedalus.cursed_chain.desc: Your weapon is cursed. Base damage is halved, but deals additional cursed damage.
enchantment.daedalus.mark_of_sin.desc: Applies a Mark of Sin to the target, invoking divine judgment.
enchantment.daedalus.void_rend.desc: Tears through space, dealing true damage. Can trigger Ragnarok on low HP foes.
enchantment.daedalus.soul_thirst.desc: Collects souls on kill. Unleashes massive magic damage when full.
Grants the protection of the abyss.
enchantment.daedalus.divine_judgment.des: Judges the undead. Has a chance to purify Zombie Villagers.
enchantment.daedalus.life_siphon.desc: Heals attacker based on damage dealt.
enchantment.daedalus.stellar_eater.desc: A miracle reversing the birth and death of stars. The weapon becomes a cage devouring light and heat, guiding all things to their destined end.
enchantment.daedalus.immortal.desc: I deny my end. I persist, therefore I am undefeated. All destruction upon me becomes the hymn of my immortality.
effect.daedalus.abyssal_curse.descriptio: Reduces Armor by 10% and Toughness by 5% per level. Reduces output damage by 10% per level (Max 80%).
effect.daedalus.mark_of_sin.description: Deals 5% (+1% per level) Max HP damage of a random type every second.
effect.daedalus.abyssal_protection.descr: Grants 10% damage reduction per level, with a 5% chance to dodge attacks completely.
effect.daedalus.angelic_protection.descr: Reduces damage from Undead by 25% per level and boosts healing by 100%. Level 4 grants flight and ignores anti-heal.
